items.title: Energy bill support extended for millions of families
items.summary: Warm Home Discount has been extended so millions of families will receive the £150 energy bill discount for the rest of the decade.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: Promotional material: Employment Rights Act 2025: factsheets
items.summary: Further details on the measures included within the Employment Rights Act 2025.

items.summary: Decision by the Secretary of State on an application for post-consent condition compliance.

items.summary: Summary of the third meeting of the United Kingdom-Vietnam Free Trade Agreement (UKVFTA) Committee on Trade and Sustainable Development.

items.title: Guidance: Impact assessment and options assessment calculator
items.summary: Help for policy officials to calculate figures for impact assessments (IAs) and options assessments (OAs).

items.title: Minister McDonald speech at ADS annual dinner 2026
items.summary: Industry Minister Chris McDonald's speech at the ADS Annual Dinner, 27 January 2026.

items.title: Offshore Energy Strategic Environmental Assessment (SEA): An overview of the SEA process
items.summary: An explanation of the offshore SEA  process, including documentation of the most recent assessment and related consultation.

items.summary: SEA scoping consultation on the draft plan/programme to enable future offshore energy leasing and licensing

items.summary: How to submit open licence returns on the SPIRE export licensing system.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.title: Comparisons of international road fuel prices
items.summary: Comparisons of road fuel prices against other EU countries, using data from the European Commission Oil Bulletin.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2026/02: updated guidance on open licence returns
items.summary: Guidance updated to clarify which licences require returns and what information exporters must provide.

items.title: Guidance: Licensing statistics quality and methodology information
items.summary: How Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) source, process and quality check data for the creation of the strategic export controls licensing statistics.

items.title: Guidance: Licensing statistics revisions policy
items.summary: How Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) correct errors and show amendments in our published strategic export controls licensing statistics.

items.title: Strategic export controls: licensing statistics
items.summary: Export control licensing statistics compiled by the Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU).

items.title: Guidance: Licensing statistics statement of administrative sources
items.summary: Data sources available to Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) for the production of the strategic export controls licensing statistics.

items.title: Official Statistics: Strategic export controls: licensing statistics: 1 July to 30 September 2025
items.summary: Export control licensing data for 1 July to 30 September 2025.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends and Prices statistical release: 29 January 2026
items.summary: The latest provisional monthly energy production, trade, electricity generation, consumption and prices statistics produced by the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK solid fuels and derived gases
items.summary: Data on coal and coal-related products, including production, trade, consumption and stocks.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK oil and oil products
items.summary: Data on oil and oil products, including upstream production and UK refinery activity, trade, stocks and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK gas
items.summary: Data on the UK's gas sector, including production, trade and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK electricity
items.summary: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK weather
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly data on weather patterns, including temperature, heating degree days, wind speeds, sun hours and rainfall.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2026/01: exporter notices and e‑alert sign‑up
items.summary: Users should sign up to the Export Control Joint Unit's (ECJU) e‑alert service to receive important updates on training and changes to the licensing regime.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK total energy
items.summary: Data on overall energy balances of energy supply and demand in the United Kingdom.

items.title: Research: Streamlined Energy and Carbon Reporting (SECR) regulations: evaluation
items.summary: An evaluation into the operation, impact, and cost-effectiveness of regulations that require businesses to report energy and carbon information in their annual accounts.

items.title: Research: Industrial Energy Transformation Fund (IETF): benefits
items.summary: Benefits of the IETF, covering funding, applicant information, emissions and savings, and case studies of successful projects.

items.title: Research: Evaluation of the Industrial Energy Transformation Fund (IETF)
items.summary: Final process evaluation of the Industrial Energy Transformation Fund (IETF) which aimed to help high energy use businesses cut their energy bills and carbon emissions.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Solar photovoltaics deployment
items.summary: Monthly deployment of all solar photovoltaic capacity in the United Kingdom.

items.title: Official Statistics: Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics: December 2025
items.summary: Statistical release on Boiler Upgrade Scheme statistics for the estimation of capital grant uptake to support the installations of low carbon technologies in domestic and non-domestic buildings.

items.title: Research: Monitoring report: UK-Australia, UK-New Zealand and UK-Japan FTAs
items.summary: This report covers the first 2 years of the UK’s free trade agreements (FTAs) with Australia and New Zealand and the first 4 years of the UK’s FTA with Japan.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on biodiesel products originating from the USA and Canada

items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on biodiesel products from the USA, including biodiesel products consigned from Canada.

items.summary: How the Capture Redress Scheme independent panel and the panel chair  will process your personal data.

items.summary: A note of the meeting held by the Interministerial Group for Trade.
